QuestData.Title: Song of Wind and Water
QuestData.Description: Listen to storm, yes? The Stormwright's Shelf echoes with ancient song.... the Song of Wind and Water.$B$BThe great tempest devours the sons of typhoons and storms. Take this drum and play his song... play Haiphoon's song.$B$BHelp him feed on wind and water so tempest can continue.
QuestData.LogDescription: Soo-nee wants you to use the Tempest Drums at the Stormwright's Shelf and help Haiphoon devour 3 Storm Revenants and 3 Aqueous Spirits.
QuestData.RewardText: I thank you, $n. The great tempest will look upon us favorably thanks to you.
